snippet.title: Unsolved Mysteries: The Continuing Saga of our XDR-TB case
snippet.description: * Unsolved Mysteries: The Continuing Saga of our XDR-TB case XDR-TB and all other emerging, infectious diseases have had my attention for a while. For some background information, read:XDR-TB: Extremely Drug Resistant, Extremely ScaryRunaway Bridegroom: XDR-TB Comes (Back) to AmericaOne of my colleagues here a...
